FuncDef:
The accounting-service-policy command controls whether to match the upstream or downstream traffic of users that go online through an AAA domain against DAA services.
By default, By default, upstream and downstream traffic of users that go online through AAA domains is matched against DAA services.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies upstream traffic of users that go online through domain.
-

Specifies downstream traffic of users that go online through domain.
-

Disable the DAA service matching function of upstream traffic of users that go online through domain.
-

Enable the DAA service matching function of upstream traffic of users that go online through domain.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To implement refined control over DAA functions, run the accounting-service-policy inbound disable command in the AAA domain view to disable the DAA service matching function of upstream traffic of users that go online through this domain, or run the accounting-service-policy outbound disable command in the AAA domain view to disable the DAA service matching function of downstream traffic of users that go online through this domain.
Configuration Impact
After the accounting-service-policy inbound disable command is run in the AAA domain view, upstream traffic of users that go online through this domain is not matched against DAA services.After the accounting-service-policy outbound disable command is run in the AAA domain view, downstream traffic of users that go online through this domain is not matched against DAA services.

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
